wordpressPost.title: Tame Impala – Wed 7th of August
wordpressPost.content:
Tame Impala, the band that made what many believe is the best album of 2012, are coming to Øya on Wednesday the 7th of August.

There are now less than 500 week passes left for sale. A week pass includes all four days in the park and entrance to all clubs under the Club Night on Tuesday 6th of august. More artists will be added to our line-up in the next few weeks.
Tickets are on sale at Billettservice

TAME IMPALA (AU)
Tame Impala from Perth, Australia, is led by Kevin Parker. He is also involved in Pond and other projects. With their two albums Inner Speaker (2010) and Lonerism (2012), Tame Impala has become one of the hottest new bands in modern rock. Critics and music fans love their mix of indie pop and acid rock. Everyone from Pitchfork to The Guardian to NME has been very enthusiastic about the the album Lonerism.

Drowned In Sound wrote this: “What is certain though is that Lonerism marks Tame Impala’s arrival as a genuine force to be reckoned with, and even if at times there’s a feeling Parker’s trying to cram too many ideas into one piece, it’s a record that will undoubtedly be used as a benchmark for guitar music of the near future”

Their first EP was released in 2008. Quickly they got on tours supporting The Black Keys, Yeasayer and MGMT. Tame Impala have been compared to Dungen, Beach House, Animal Collective and Grizzly Bear, but also older bands like the Beatles and Todd Rundgrens old band Nazz. Tame Impala have managed to create their own kind of modern indie rock. We are confident that this is the perfect band for the festival summer in 2013.
http://www.tameimpala.com/

 

photo: Matt Saville

messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
